name: Fantasma (itch) (Ghost)
description:
This is a game about a boy who just got out of an orphanage and just recently found out a terrible thing about his favorite idol. Falling asleep, he scrolls in his head everything that happened. As he falls asleep, he replays everything that happened in his head.

---

The game has been translated into English and Russian. You can change them in the game settings.

In the future, it is possible that the game will be completely changed along with the plot and the appearance of the characters.

Good luck to all✪ ω ✪
